response.overview: Nicolás, a frustrated actor who spends his free time fixing things he finds in the trash, tries to lead a quiet life in his apartment building. His neighbor Clara, a kind and reserved schoolteacher, also follows her routine, until a mysterious painting begins to alter the atmosphere around them.  What initially seems like a simple curiosity gradually affects both their moods and perceptions, giving rise to increasingly strange situations.
response.title: My other self
